titles.title: To suspend until January 1, 1997, the duty on certain chemicals.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

action.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Trade.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

action.text: Executive Comment Requested from Treasury, Commerce, ITC, USTR.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

bill.summary: 11/3/1993--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to suspend, through December 31, 1996, the duty on: (1) 3,5-dimethyl-2-hydroxymethyl-4-methoxy-pyridine (pyrmethyl alcohol); (2) 2-mercapto 5-methoxy benzimidazole (metmercazole); (3) m-chloroperoxybenzoic acid (MCPBA); and (4) n'-(aminosulfonyl)-3-(((2-((diaminomethylene)-amino)-4-thiazoly)- methyl)thio) propanimidamide (famotidine).
